title: Project-Based Design and Systems Thinking Education: Creative Problem-Solving Competency Development for Elementary Mathematics Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of elementary mathematics curriculum and basic teaching methodologies
context.additional_context: A project-based learning (PBL) course for pre-service and in-service elementary teachers to develop creative problem-solving skills by integrating design and systems thinking into mathematics instruction

learning_goals: Learners can perform projects analyzing real-life problems through mathematical modeling and systems thinking at least twice
Learners can develop mathematical problem-solving strategies by applying the five stages of Design Thinking
Learners can create interdisciplinary integrated lesson plans through collaboration with peer teachers

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
